steps.title: Sketch a large flower.
steps.content: Sketch a large flower.

steps.title: Draw a stick figure of a fairy sitting on the center of the flower.
steps.content: Draw a stick figure of a fairy sitting on the center of the flower.

steps.title: Sketch the fairy’s body and add a pair of wings on her back.
steps.content: Sketch the fairy’s body and add a pair of wings on her back.

steps.title: Draw the fairy’s dress.
steps.content: Draw the fairy’s dress.

steps.title: Sketch the parts of the face like the eyes, nose and lips; frame it with the hairstyle you want.
steps.content: Sketch the parts of the face like the eyes, nose and lips; frame it with the hairstyle you want. Some fairies have pointy ears, you can also draw it here.

steps.title: Darken the outline of the body you sketched earlier.
steps.content: Darken the outline of the body you sketched earlier.

steps.title: Refine the lines and erase unnecessary ones.
steps.content: Refine the lines and erase unnecessary ones.

steps.title: Color the fairy.
steps.content: Color the fairy.

steps.title: Sketch a rough outline of the fairy's body using a stick figure.
steps.content: Sketch a rough outline of the fairy's body using a stick figure. During this step, think of what position you imagine your fairy to be in - she could be sitting or lying down. This illustration will be a sketch of a fairy that is flying. Add a crossed vertical and horizontal line on the face for accurate positioning of the face’s parts.

steps.title: Draw the fairy’s body.
steps.content: Draw the fairy’s body. Add a pair of wings and refine the hands’ details by drawing the fingers.

steps.title: Sketch a pair of large anime style eyes.
steps.content: Sketch a pair of large anime style eyes. Draw the nose and sketch a smiling lip on the fairy’s face.

steps.title: Sketch the outline of the face and frame it with your desired hairstyle.
steps.content: Sketch the outline of the face and frame it with your desired hairstyle.

steps.title: Draw the fairy’s dress.
steps.content: Draw the fairy’s dress.

steps.title: Darken the body’s outline and add design, as desired on the wings.
steps.content: Darken the body’s outline and add design, as desired on the wings.

steps.title: Add pixie dust for added glimmer, if you want.
steps.content: Add pixie dust for added glimmer, if you want.

steps.title: Color the fairy.
steps.content: Color the fairy.

steps.title: Sketch a circle for the head.
steps.content: Sketch a circle for the head.

steps.title: Sketch the guidelines for the face as well as the chin and the jaw line.
steps.content: Sketch the guidelines for the face as well as the chin and the jaw line.

steps.title: Then, sketch an oblong for the body.
steps.content: Then, sketch an oblong for the body.

steps.title: Add the extremities (arms and the legs).
steps.content: Add the extremities (arms and the legs).

steps.title: Draw the fairy wings by drawing irregular oblongs.
steps.content: Draw the fairy wings by drawing irregular oblongs.

steps.title: Sketch the draft of the hair you want for your fairy.
steps.content: Sketch the draft of the hair you want for your fairy.

steps.title: Sketch the clothes of the fairy as you want.
steps.content: Sketch the clothes of the fairy as you want.

steps.title: Sketch 2 circles for the eyes.
steps.content: Sketch 2 circles for the eyes.

steps.title: Draw the basic outline of the fairy.
steps.content: Draw the basic outline of the fairy.

steps.title: Erase the draft and put in more details.
steps.content: Erase the draft and put in more details.

steps.title: Color the fairy.
steps.content: Color the fairy.

steps.title: Sketch a circle for the head.
steps.content: Sketch a circle for the head. Add a line in the middle of the circle.

steps.title: Sketch the chin and the jaw line.
steps.content: Sketch the chin and the jaw line.

steps.title: Then, sketch an oblong for the body and the extremities (arms and the legs).
steps.content: Then, sketch an oblong for the body and the extremities (arms and the legs).

steps.title: Sketch the guidelines of the face.
steps.content: Sketch the guidelines of the face.

steps.title: Sketch the draft shapes for the mouth and the eyes.
steps.content: Sketch the draft shapes for the mouth and the eyes.

steps.title: Sketch the draft of the fairy wings.
steps.content: Sketch the draft of the fairy wings.

steps.title: Sketch the hair of the fairy as you want.
steps.content: Sketch the hair of the fairy as you want.

steps.title: Sketch the clothes of the fairy.
steps.content: Sketch the clothes of the fairy.

steps.title: Draw the basic outline of the fairy.
steps.content: Draw the basic outline of the fairy.

steps.title: Erase the draft and put in more details.
steps.content: Erase the draft and put in more details.

steps.title: Color the fairy.
steps.content: Color the fairy.
